{{ddcl|header=cstdio|
int fgetc( std::FILE* stream );
int getc( std::FILE* stream );
}}

Reads the next character from the given input stream.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|stream|to read the character from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The obtained character on success or {{lc|EOF}} on failure.

If the failure has been caused by end of file condition, additionally sets the ''eof'' indicator (see {{lc|std::feof()}}) on {{c|stream}}. If the failure has been caused by some other error, sets the ''error'' indicator (see {{lc|std::ferror()}}) on {{c|stream}}.
